attributes.action: Make it Law that Children from Five upward are Taught RESPECT to Adults.
attributes.additional_details:
This is part and Parcel to Many issues today, things have become to soft, Pupils Cheeking Teachers, The Police and so on, I was so Taught that Children of my age would NEVER have dreamed to Attack an Aged person, today they do just that, was Taught to give up my seat for Adults and speak in a Proper Manor to them, things have gone Downhill over the past years and need correcting.

Let’s start getting Respect for Pensioners and Adults alike plus the Emergency Services and Teachers.
attributes.background: Today Children are Lacking Any respect not only to Adults but the Police, Teachers, Ambulance Crew and Fire, things need changing to instill this into them as at this time there is No Respect with Many, they Abuse Teachers, Cheek Adults in the Street, Police officers say the same, Shame.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the Government to include lessons about respect in the National Curriculum.
